legacy.full_text: It’s been five years since I last visited the #US in 2018, and many things have changed after trade war, covid pandemic and rising tensions between 🇨🇳and 🇺🇸. But the first thing I noticed when arrived at #SanFrancisco airport is the hospitality of American people. Welcome back. https://t.co/uON4ewzXdF
